  name  \\rz-home\ff9315\Desktop\FbLeftSend
  bits           24
  flags SPACE_ENC|CONST_LENGTH
  eps            30
  aeps          100

  one           187   807
  zero          187   330
  ptrail        185
  gap          210903
  toggle_bit_mask 0x0

      begin codes
          DIVE                    0xC9B187
          CLIMB                   0xC9B14B
          TAILLEFT                0xC9B12D
          TAILRIGHT               0xC9B11E

      end codes

end remote
